modules.description: This module sends metrics to an InfluxDB server over TCP, batching and tagging them with optional virtual machine and hostname identifiers. It works with MirageOS network stacks and clock modules, handling reconnection and rate-limiting intervals for efficient reporting. Concrete use cases include monitoring virtual machine performance metrics like CPU usage or network throughput in cloud environments.

This module implements metrics collection and reporting for MirageOS-based applications, providing functions to record counters, gauges, and timing measurements. It works with MirageOS-compatible time and clock interfaces to enable telemetry in unikernel environments. Concrete use cases include tracking HTTP request latencies, connection counts, and resource usage in MirageOS network services.
